page.title: 18Policing W.Grove/Denchworth
page.content: W.Grove and Denchworth people are, generally, law abiding. About 20 people get taken to the Police Station per month, the Station being a small one of 4 cells in Wantage. There is little violence in the area, a small amount of shoplifting, some drunkeness and drug taking. But the crime rate reflects the expected behaviour of the type of resident found in the area and is not great. There are a few traffic problems, driving crimes, teenage problems and personal vendettas and quarrels. Sometimes the police are called to other areas, like Greenham Common near Newbury, where help is needed to control groups like the Peace People whose aim is to persuade the government to outlaw the American atom bomb bases. In the country there is the odd cattle rustling to deal with.
